Name: Bomber 95
About the game: Bomber 95 is the recreation of old school bomberman like game. With the ability to play with friends on one PC or over the Internet or both of those simultaneously. Nine unique levels with their own features, a lot of blow-ups and power-ups that can change gameplay balance instantly. Defeat them all and dance floor is yours! Features: Up to nine players Ability to play hot seat with friends and with online players simultaneously Nine unique levels with their own features Power-ups that can significantly change gameplay balance
Meta Title: Bomber 95: Aug 4, 2018, Dmitry Azarov and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Bomber 95? Check out the release date (Aug 4, 2018), developer insights from Dmitry Azarov, and a complete game summary.
